channel.title: CNN.com - Top Stories
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

image.title: CNN.com - Top Stories
image.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

item.title: Lena Dunham to undergo surgery
item.description: Lena Dunham has been hospitalized and will undergo surgery for a ruptured ovarian cyst, her spokeswoman said.

item.title: Clinton, Sanders to debate
Opinion: She was larger than life
item.description: Nancy Reagan will be mourned all over the world. She was a huge figure in 1980s America, with many who revered her and many who did not. But everyone who lived through the era agreed that she was a major presence in the nation's history.

item.title: Jimmy Carter shares his good news
item.description: The news keeps getting better for former President Jimmy Carter.

item.title: Thousands of refugees stuck on border
item.description: Eight-year-old Hamze is the family clown among his six siblings, declaring he wants to be a teacher and then cheekily changing his answer to egg salesman, knowing it will generate laughter.

item.title: Exhausted Djokovic wins Davis Cup epic
item.description: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray had to survive marathon five-set encounters to lead their countries into a Davis Cup quarterfinal match up Sunday.

item.title: NFL star Peyton Manning to retire
item.description: Peyton Manning has informed the Denver Broncos that he will retire from the National Football League, according to the team's official website Sunday. The team's verified Twitter account said that the Broncos congratulate Manning for his "magnificent 18-year NFL career." No official news conference has been announced.

item.title: Trump campaign shows cracks
Clinton: Email controversy will be solved
item.description: Hillary Clinton predicted that the controversy over her use of a private email server while secretary of state is nearing its end.

item.title: Former first lady died today of heart failure at the age of 94
Trump, Cruz score double victories
Political world mourns Nancy Reagan
item.description: The political world mourned Nancy Reagan on Sunday, with Republican presidential candidates current and former honoring the former first lady and calling her death the end of an influential era in the party.

item.title: Photos: The life of Nancy Reagan
item.description: Former first lady Nancy Reagan, who joined her husband on a storybook journey from Hollywood to the White House, died Sunday. She was 94.

item.title: Iranian billionaire sentenced to death
MH370 victims remembered
item.description: CNN's Saima Mohsin explains how families are remembering the vicitims of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 two years on.

item.title: This is what it's like to have dyslexia
item.description: One in five people suffer from it and famous figures from Tom Cruise to Richard Branson have spoken at length about how it has affected their lives.

item.title: Has Banksy been unmasked?
NASA explores Saturn moon's 'magic island'
Pope: Nuns killed in attack are martyrs
item.description: An al Qaeda umbrella group is denying links to an attack that killed 16 people at an elderly home founded by Mother Teresa in Yemen.

item.title: Diver: I was sucked into nuclear plant pipe
ISIS claims suicide attack; 31 dead
item.description: A suicide bomber killed 22 people and left dozens injured south of Baghdad on Sunday, Iraqi police officials said.

item.title: Trump's odds sink as Ted Cruz surges
item.description: A strong Super Saturday performance has given Ted Cruz a big boost in CNN's Political Prediction Market, while Donald Trump has seen his odds of claiming the Republican nomination drop 15% in less than 24 hours.

item.title: Opinion: Clinton, Trump perfect foils
Family uses 151 bottles of water per day
item.description: An "arsenal" of cases of fresh water stacked in the basement and a graveyard of scattered empty bottles are daily reminders that life in Flint, Michigan, is anything but normal.

item.title: Drowned toddler: Two sentenced
item.description: Two Syrian men have been sentenced in Turkey to more than four years in prison in connection with the boat accident that claimed the life of Alan Kurdi, the young boy whose lifeless body came to symbolize the plight of refugees risking everything in their desperation to secure a better life.
